enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Only students in the MSJ program may enroll in these classes
title: JOUR JOUR 424-1-20 Magazine Editing

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Focus on magazine-style feature editing, techniques for guiding and editing writers, story development and editorial concepts. Students taking the Magazine Publishing Project learn the basics of magazine development and begin to propose print and digital concepts for consumer and trade magazines.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
MSJ program only
prerequisites: Methods, Q2 coursework.

subject: JOUR
